Original:
位於圓山捷運站出來，走路3分鐘就會到的隱藏威士忌主題餐酒館🤩

一進到店內，有別於一般餐酒館，座位空間蠻大的，也沒有太多隔板隔閡，可以讓大家更容易一起聊天閒聊，重點是！！！還有兩隻可愛的店貓在店裡穿梭～可以擼貓的餐酒館，真的太屌了😍
虎克跟炒泡麵（貓貓名）也都超可愛超親人～

店裡有超過600種以上的威士忌，還在持續增加中！本來想說，像我這種威士忌的小白會很困擾，不知道要喝什麼，還好老闆跟老闆娘都非常貼心，會非常詳細的介紹以及推薦，適合您的酒款，老闆連每瓶酒的故事出產、特色都一清二楚，不管是愛不愛喝威士忌的你，都非常適合來體驗～
ps.如果真的威士忌喝不習慣，這裡也有好幾款日本清酒可以挑，真的超貼心👍

說到餐酒館，餐點一定是馬乎不了的，這次跟我老婆來，點了：
舒肥雞炒泡麵🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
炒的軟硬剛好的泡麵，配上軟嫩舒肥雞，最後加上一顆溏心蛋，根本是完美的絕配，讓人一下子就吃完一碗😋
崁仔頂魚市甜不辣🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
炸的外酥內軟的甜不辣，咬下去還有滿滿的魚香味，真不愧是老闆推薦的料理，好吃！
香酥唐揚雞塊🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
本來想說在這種地方點的炸雞，一定沒有正統日式店來的好吃，結果一吃下去，真的有驚艷到，咬下去！下個肉汁噴出來～不誇張，真的超juicy，個人很推薦👍
起司盤🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
這起司盤有夠大盤，可以慢慢吃慢慢品嚐味道，共有兩種起司，一種是帕瑪森起司一種是卡門貝爾，帕瑪森起司是屬於比較鹹的香的，卡門貝爾則是屬於，越含越香的，配合混合嘴中的味道後，會有淡淡的香味，蠻少吃到的味道～
煙燻鴨腿🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
這鴨腿真的有夠好吃，非常的多汁，完全不會柴，煙燻味也很濃，非常的香，這我也超推薦👍👍
酒品我們有點了3種，不過我跟我老婆都是小白，名字有點記不清了，附上照片給大家看🥹
一開始喝的是外瓶上有一個18標誌的，果香味跟花香味的襯托，整體喝起來比較不會那麼濃烈，非常適合比較少喝威士忌的我們～
第二款喝的是外瓶是藍色的貼紙上面還有16的標誌，這款威士忌喝起來，也非常的好喝，相較第一款，這一款的味道更直接一點，可以讓你非常清楚的感受到他的酒香！
第三款是艾雷島嘉年華的限定酒，這款是很喜歡煙燻味的我，請老闆介紹的酒，所以記憶比較深刻，真的有滿滿的煙燻味，喝起來很過癮😎

整體來說是一間非常完美的餐酒館，有好吃的餐點又有好喝的酒，還有優質的服務態度，老闆和老闆娘人也都超熱情超好的，重點還有貓可以嚕，這間只要有機會，我一定會再回訪，強烈推薦大家也可以來試試看，尤其是喜歡威士忌的人，這裡絕對是你們的樂園😆😆😆
聽老闆說，這裡也常常會辦活動，有品酒會、之前還有塔羅牌算命，真的很有趣～
EN:
The hidden whiskey theme meal and tavern, located in the Yuanshan MRT, walk 3 minutes.

As soon as you enter the store, it is different from the general dining tavern. The seat space is quite large, and there are not many barriers. It can make everyone easier to chat and chat together. The point is!IntersectionIntersectionThere are also two cute shop cats shuttled in the store ~ ​​The restaurant that can sting the cat, it is really a bit 😍
Huke and fried noodles (cat names) are also super cute and super loved ones ~

There are more than 600 types of whiskey in the store, which are still increasing!I wanted to say that Xiaobai, a whiskey like me, would be very troublesome. I do n’t know what to drink. Fortunately, the boss and the boss are very intimate, and they will introduce and recommend it very detailed. The stories are produced and unique. Whether you love or drink whiskey, you are very suitable to experience it ~
PS. If you really drink it, there are also several Japanese sake to pick here.

Speaking of the dining tavern, the meal must be unable to care. This time, I came with my wife and ordered:
Shu Fei chicken fried instant noodles
The frying soft and hard instant noodles, with a soft tender and soft chicken, and finally a hearty egg, is a perfect match at all, letting people eat a bowl of it all at once.
Saipa is sweet and not spicy 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
The fried outer crispy and soft inside is not spicy, and the bite is full of fish flavor. It is indeed a dish recommended by the boss. It is delicious!
Crispy Tang Yang chicken nuggets 扬
I wanted to say that fried chicken ordered in this kind of place must not have the delicious Japanese -style shop. As a result, when I ate it, it was really amazing and bite!The next gravy is sprayed out ~ No exaggeration, really super juicy, I personally recommend 👍
Cheese
There is a large market for this division, and you can eat slowly and taste the taste slowly. There are two types of cheese. One is the Parman cheese and the other is Kamen Bell. Carmenbel belongs to the more fragrant, the more fragrant, and the taste in the mixed mouth will have a faint fragrance.
Smoked duck legs 鸭
This duck leg is really delicious enough, very juicy, no firewood at all, the smoky taste is also very strong, very fragrant, I also recommend it
We have three kinds of wine, but I and my wife are both white, and the name is a bit unclear. Attach a photo to everyone 🥹
At the beginning, there was a 18 logo on the bottle. The fruity aroma and the fragrance of flowers were not so strong. It is very suitable for us who drink less whiskey ~
The second model is that the outside bottle is a sign of 16 on the blue sticker. This whiskey is also very delicious. Compared to the first one, this one tastes more directly, which can make you make you Feel his wine very clearly!
The third paragraph is the limited wine of the Ailei Carnival. This is a smoky flavor. I ask the boss to introduce the wine, so the memory is deep, really full of smoke, it is very enjoyable.

On the whole, it is a very perfect dining tavern. There are delicious meals and delicious wines, as well as high -quality service attitude. The boss and the boss are also very enthusiastic and good. As long as there is a chance, I will definitely return to visit. I strongly recommend that you can try it, especially those who like whiskey. This is definitely your paradise.
Listening to the boss said that activities are often held here, there are wine tasting, and there are Tarot fierce fortune -telling before, it is really interesting ~

Original:
Whisky land 威士忌樂園，其實聽身邊的賓友們說這間已經很久了，今天終於又解鎖了。

多元單杯威士忌餐酒小館，坐落在圓山捷運站邊上，是以食物創新美味並可搭配多種單杯威士忌結合的餐酒館，一進店裡就可以看到整排超過500種以上的威士忌讓大家自由挑選，在這威士忌是以杯計價 一杯20ml (標價都在後面)，除了價格真的非常親民外，老闆們也是非常用心的介紹，真的很適合很多想品嘗不一樣的客人來這享用與探索威士忌的世界。

當然，餐點其實是這邊的重點，老闆們在食材的挑選也是嚴選把關，加上由大美女闆闆Ann親自烹煮，除了一般常駐的下酒菜外，還可以先電來預訂溝通想吃的私房料理喔。

崁仔頂漁市甜不辣，老闆是在深夜店裡打烊後再開車到基隆現場等候製作採買回來的，基隆的魚漿 本就純度較高，烹煮後加上點胡椒提味，熱熱的Q彈嚼感那扎實的魚肉，口感真的很棒。

花枝排也是店家的熱銷產品，可惜我沒法享用，不然看大神沒幾分鐘就整盤嗑光了，肯定是非常好吃啊。

舒肥滷牛腱，濃厚的牛油香氣與Ｑ彈溼潤的口感，配上蔥花就是老饕們的最愛。 舒肥的手法把牛肉的香甜原味保存，肉變與筋膜也變得易嚼卻還保有Q彈的口感，這也是酒的好朋友啊。

除了威士忌外，這邊還有精釀啤酒可以選擇喔。

感謝大神大大的帶領又多了一個舒服放鬆的好據點。

台北市大同區民族西路31巷6號

EN:
Whisky Land Whiskey Park, in fact, listening to the guests around him said that this has been a long time, and it is finally unlocked again today.

The multi -cup whiskey meal liquor is located on the side of the Yuanshan MRT station. It is a restaurant that is innovative and delicious with food and a variety of single cups. The above whiskey allows everyone to choose freely. In this whiskey, a cup is priced at 20ml (the price is behind). In addition to the price is really very close to the people, the bosses are also very careful. It is really suitable for many people who want to taste differently. Guests come here to enjoy and explore the world of whiskey.

Of course, the meal is actually the focus of here. The selection of the bosses is also strictly selected by the ingredients. In addition, it is cooked by the beautiful women's board Ann. In addition to the general residential dishes, you can also call for communication first to communicate and communicate. I want to eat private food.

The Taipa Ding fishing market is sweet and not spicy. The boss is closed in the late -night shop and then drove to Keelung to wait for the production to buy it. The fish slurry of Keelung is high. After cooking The solid fish of the Q bomb chewy feeling is really great.

Huazhi row is also a hot -selling product of the store. Unfortunately, I ca n’t enjoy it. Otherwise, it ’s not a few minutes to see the gods. It’ s very delicious.

Shu Fei halocated beef tendon, the strong butter aroma and the wet taste of the bomb, with the onion is the favorite of the old ladies.Shu Fei ’s method saves the sweetness of the beef, and the flesh and fascia become easy to chew, but it still has a Q bomber taste. This is also a good friend of wine.

In addition to whiskey, there are also craft beer to choose from here.

Thanks to Great God for the great leadership, there is a good base that is more comfortable and relaxed.

Original:
WhiskyLand威士忌樂園，位於圓山花博附近，比起大部分在商業區的酒吧氣氛更溫暖，一進去店裡就被可愛的貓吸引，店員和客人間互動都很融洽，加上酒款和餐點價位更為親民，是會想要再來的店。
觀察起來不論是第一次來或是熟客，店員都會介紹店內的酒款，不過大部分客人對想喝的酒大概都有自己的想法。今天點了小山貓Clynelish2020限定版和舊版14年份品嚐，店內有麥卡倫Edition系列「完整版」但必須No1-6全套喝、體驗價3000元，日威選擇不多點了無年份宮城峽，想要試試水割みずわり喝法要了冰塊，結果店員很好意給了一大桶冰桶😅。
搭酒的餐點了雞胸炒泡麵、崁仔頂魚市甜不辣、松露地瓜酒香腸，雞胸沒有擔心的肉太老問題、搭配半熟蛋更是亮點，甜不辣是基隆魚漿打的口感很好，香腸和小山貓14年意外的搭👍。
今天來店很幸運遇到威姬百喝Vickypedia本人，因為在工作的關係就不好意思去合照了，希望下次有機會😊。
*結帳可以用line pay
EN:
Whiskyland Whiskey Park is located near the Yuanshan Flower Expo. It is warmer than most of the bar at the bar in the business district. As soon as you enter the store, you will be attracted by cute cats. The price is more close to the people, and it is a shop that you want to come back.
Observe whether it is the first time or a cooked customer, the clerk will introduce the wine in the store, but most of the guests probably have their own ideas about the wine they want to drink.Today, I ordered the small Clynelish2020 limited edition and the old version of the 14-year taste. There is a "full version" in the store in the store, but it must drink a full set of NO1-6 and experience the price of 3,000 yuan. I wanted to try the ice cubes of the water cutting. As a result, the clerk gave a large bucket of ice buckets.
The meal of the wine ordered the chicken breast fried noodles, the sweet and spicy fish market of the Taipa top fish, the sausage of the truffle sweetness, and the meat lady with no worries, and the half -cooked eggs are even more highlights. The taste is very good, and the sausage and the Bobcat are unexpectedly embarrassed in 14 years.
I was lucky to meet Victypedia himself when I came to the store today. I was embarrassed to take a photo because I was at work. I hope I will have the opportunity next time.
*You can use LINE PAY at checkout

Original:
沒有這麼想離開一家店過，甚至連酒都不想喝完。
當天入場才告知幾乎有人包場，入座30分鐘後整個店都是煎烤牛排的油煙，沒想到環境會是這麼的糟糕！

我不想分享任何威士忌圖片，店裡有500-600多瓶。收藏範圍廣泛，不僅限於台灣釀酒廠，還包括許多蘇格蘭威士忌，尤其是布赫拉迪和夏洛特港。店主很年輕，人很好，很高興和他聊天。
我會再次造訪威士忌之地。
EN:
A exciting Saturday night was spent in the Taiwan whiskey park.
I don't want to share any whiskey pictures, there are more than 500-600 bottles in the store.It has a wide range of collection, not only limited to Taiwan brewry, but also many Scottish whiskey, especially Blahladi and Charlotte.The owner is very young, people are very good, and they are very happy to chat with him.
I will visit the whiskey place again.

Original:
威士忌的種類很多，食物也很美味。
店裡的氣氛很普通。
EN:
There are many types of whiskey and delicious food.
The atmosphere in the store is very ordinary.

Original: 品嚐各種威士忌系列的絕佳場所。這不是一個便宜的喝醉的地方，但絕對是享受不同種類威士忌的好地方。  提供的起司拼盤也不錯
EN: Taste the excellent places for various whiskey series.This is not a cheap place to get drunk, but it is definitely a good place to enjoy different types of whiskey.The cheese platter provided is also good

EN: You can enjoy delicious malt whiskey with cute cat managers.This is a friendly and friendly store.
